originalText.text: Working with Rob, Avis and the Birdsnest team has been a great experience. We have done several jobs with them over the past 4 years and each time the video was done professionally. They also have great creativity and can help you create beautiful messages. They are responsive and open to helping. Five stars.

text.text: Working with Rob, Avis and the Birdsnest team has been a great experience. We have done several jobs with them over the past 4 years and each time the video was done professionally. They also have great creativity and can help you create beautiful messages. They are responsive and open to helping. Five stars.

originalText.text: As a not-for-profit organization providing arts in education services for NYC public school children, we are so very grateful to have had the opportunity to work with Bird's Nest at a very reduced rate. The team was flexible as the pandemic hit and allowed us to defer our grant support until we were able to make plans for a virtual benefit--they were able to plan and execute video services quickly as we ramped up for the virtual event and also supported the organization as we "went public" with it. Thank you for your support and expertise!

text.text: As a not-for-profit organization providing arts in education services for NYC public school children, we are so very grateful to have had the opportunity to work with Bird's Nest at a very reduced rate. The team was flexible as the pandemic hit and allowed us to defer our grant support until we were able to make plans for a virtual benefit--they were able to plan and execute video services quickly as we ramped up for the virtual event and also supported the organization as we "went public" with it. Thank you for your support and expertise!

originalText.text: My company Powered by Professionals has had the privilege of working with Birds Nest Productions for many years through the amazing organizations we work with.  They are professional and extremely talented.  Thank you Rob, Avis, Israel and the whole team.

text.text: My company Powered by Professionals has had the privilege of working with Birds Nest Productions for many years through the amazing organizations we work with.  They are professional and extremely talented.  Thank you Rob, Avis, Israel and the whole team.

originalText.text:
I've had the pleasure of working with Rob and the team in live and virtual events. They understand our goals and worked with us to make sure we could achieve them, creating beautiful videos not just for the event--but could live longer.

Both the live event and the virtual one were a success for guests. I highly recommend and they are first on the list when you need a professional team to tell a story and engage an audience.

originalText.text: Fantastic organization with a long-track record of high quality media production and storytelling on both the foundation and corporation fronts. Impressive ability to go from 0 to final product, while incorporating client input and supplementing it with Birds Nest's years of knowledge on how to best convey the essence of the client's message!
